Title: Glued, Where's My Bob?
Writer: Loren Bouchard (created by), Loren Bouchard (developed by), Jim Dauterive (developed by), Steven Davis, Kelvin Yu, Mike Benner (story editor), Jim Dauterive (creator)
Actors: H. Jon Benjamin, Dan Mintz, Eugene Mirman, Larry Murphy
Plot: The Belcher children are involved in a goop war prank that takes place on the same day that a journalist is visiting the restaurant to write a profile.:
